name: Deceptica
description:
Deceptica is a modernized 3D rail shooter packed with a lot of action set in Naryt, a planet in the dystopian future where the pilot of Deceptica, our protagonist, is locked in a matrix-like endless loop of military slaughter. Now that he's awakened to its senses, he must escape the planet, even if that means killing his brainwashed teammates!

Although the game is not complete and this is just a demo, I hope you enjoy it! This was a solo project I did back in the summer of 2019, now releasing it for everyone to 'give it a shot' (heh)

TIPS AND HOW TO PLAY:

  • Your objective is to kill your enemies and survive for the whole level's duration, plain and simple.
  • Move with W, A, S, D.
  • Aim with your mouse and shoot with the left click.
  • Do barrel rolls with either shift or space.
  • If your shields drop down to 0, you lose.
  • If you crash into anything, you lose (watch out!)

Now you're ready to go!

PD: Can you beat my personal record? It's 17600 points. If you do, let me know! :P
